title: First of the Month, Bakari Sellers Interview, Stephen Jackson, Philly, ATL and more.
itunes:title: First of the Month, Bakari Sellers Interview, Stephen Jackson, Philly, ATL and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We are here to keep you informed following a very difficult weekend. Sick and tired of being sick and tired. The race discussion gets deep. Bakari Sellers shares his life with us and also talks about his latest book My Vanishing Country. "Rioting is the language of the unheard." - MLK Former NBA star Stephen Jackson reminds us to not hustle backwards. Steve speaks to callers from Philly and Atlanta about the effects of the pandemic and rioting. Peaceful protesting is encouraged. There is a special about TLC on The CW. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about what is missing in the White House and leaves us with this, "Don't give them a pin to stick you with!"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
